name: RTCPeerConnection.connectionstatechange_event
description: The connectionstatechange event is sent to the ontrack event handler on an RTCPeerConnection object after a new track has been added to an RTCRtpReceiver which is part of the connection.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
